synopsis.text: Twin Star Brigade beware, as the Galaxy Angels are back in full force! The Angel Brigade's mission is to locate and retrieve ancient Lost Technology, but their chaotic antics often lead them astray. The team consists of the ever-lucky but scatter-brained Milfeulle, trigger-happy Forte, flirtatious Ranpha, costume enthusiast Mint, and the virtuous Vanilla, all guided by their AI companion, Normad. However, this time around, the Angels face stiff competition from their new rivals. As they struggle to stay afloat amidst financial woes and the constant mayhem they create, the Galaxy Angels vow to protect the galaxy one planet at a time, while providing endless laughs and entertainment. Will they rise to the challenge or succumb to the chaos they create? Join the Angel Brigade in their wild adventures across the cosmos!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
